summary: A topless dancer attracts, seduces, then murders the men she sleeps with. She does it with a twist, however; she kills them with garden tools.
cast: Susan Stewart|Steve Vincent|James Brand|Vic Lance|Pat Barrington|Janu Wine|Stuart Lancaster|John Caroll|John LaSalle|Hinton Pope|Bethel Buckalew|Lyn Armondo|Norton Halper|Judith Crane|Cheryl Trepton|Paul Hunt|William Rotsler
title: Lila
